EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.22 - Prelogin - Small Business Week.Prelogin - Small Business Week
EmailTemplate.subject: =?utf-8?Q?It=E2=80=99s_Small_Business_Week_=F0=9F=8E=89?=
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're Doing A Great Job! It’s Small Business Week, and we’d like to recognize your dedication, drive and hard work. To show our support, and to let you know that we are here for you, no matter how much your future goals may change, we’d like to share some great small business tips with you.
